vulnerabilities.description:
PaymentProcessorUnchecked.sendPayment(uint256,bytes) (data/synthetic/unchecked_return_value/unchecked_return_value_000/malicious.sol#20-26) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- trustedRecipient.call{value: amount}(data) (data/synthetic/unchecked_return_value/unchecked_return_value_000/malicious.sol#24)

PaymentProcessorUnchecked.sendPayment(uint256,bytes) (data/synthetic/unchecked_return_value/unchecked_return_value_000/malicious.sol#20-26) ignores return value by trustedRecipient.call{value: amount}(data) (data/synthetic/unchecked_return_value/unchecked_return_value_000/malicious.sol#24)

Reentrancy in PaymentProcessorUnchecked.sendPayment(uint256,bytes) (data/synthetic/unchecked_return_value/unchecked_return_value_000/malicious.sol#20-26):
	External calls:
	- trustedRecipient.call{value: amount}(data) (data/synthetic/unchecked_return_value/unchecked_return_value_000/malicious.sol#24)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- PaymentSent(msg.sender,trustedRecipient,amount,data) (data/synthetic/unchecked_return_value/unchecked_return_value_000/malicious.sol#25)
